20101220180108.000|20101220180110.000|TR0|in central England and three in London.

20101220180115.000|20101220180118.000|TR0|from 17 to 28.  All are said to be of

20101220180746.000|20101220180748.000|TR0|recall that we want to flag for you.  The 
20101220180748.000|20101220180750.000|TR0|brands are Pet Pride, Old Yeller, and 
20101220180750.000|20101220180753.000|TR0|Kroger Value.  Can and dog dry foods. 
20101220180753.000|20101220180755.000|TR0|Kroger stores in 17 states are involved.  
20101220180755.000|20101220180757.000|TR0|Source of outlets run by the Kroger 
20101220180757.000|20101220180800.000|TR0|Company under different names  --  
20101220180800.000|20101220180802.000|TR0|Dillons, Bakers, Food for Less, among 
20101220180802.000|20101220180805.000|TR0|others.  Now, the problem is aflitoxin 
20101220180805.000|20101220180807.000|TR0|contamination. It's a fungus that can hit 
20101220180807.000|20101220180809.000|TR0|corn and other crops.
20101220180809.000|20101220180812.000|TR0|
20101220180812.000|20101220180814.000|TR0|Here's what you need to do.  If you're 
20101220180814.000|20101220180816.000|TR0|worried about what you're feeding your 
20101220180816.000|20101220180819.000|TR0|dog, first  --  or your cat, first, head 
20101220180819.000|20101220180821.000|TR0|to Kroger.com for details on specific 
20101220180821.000|20101220180824.000|TR0|stores, states, and sell-by dates. If 
20101220180824.000|20101220180826.000|TR0|you've feeding your pet this recall food, 
20101220180826.000|20101220180828.000|TR0|stop.  If your cat or dog is lethargic, 
20101220180828.000|20101220180831.000|TR0|doesn't want to eat, maybe looks gaundice, 
20101220180831.000|20101220180833.000|TR0|call your vet ASAP and let them know that 
20101220180833.000|20101220180835.000|TR0|you heard about this recall so that they

20101220184405.000|20101220184408.000|TR0|VELSHI:  Is it, however, playing out as a

20101220184417.000|20101220184420.000|TR0|PARK:  Well, I think the Koreans, since
